product_name: Advanced Elements Firefly Inflatable Kayak Paddler's Pack - Special Buy
long_description: You'll have a blast on the water with the Advanced Elements Firefly inflatable kayak paddler's pack. Paddler's pack includes the inflatable kayak, seat, duffel bag, repair kit, instruction manual and foot pump. Constructed of durable materials to provide superb puncture resistance; welded seams ensure long life. Rigid bow and stern reinforcements slice gracefully through water; removable tracking fin provides improved handling. Sets up quickly and is compact enough to take along for an adventure just about anywhere. Easy-to-use Spring(TM) and Twistlok(TM) valves are compatible with most pumps and speed setup time. Bungee deck lacing lets you stow gear easily; molded, low-profile rubber handles allow smooth transport to and from the water. Special buy.
short_description: You'll have a blast on the water with the Advanced Elements Firefly inflatable kayak paddler's pack.
